Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone device that allows two students to communicate over a distance.
The student can show in the drawing that the device uses sound to communicate.
The student can identify and label the materials used in the string telephone in their drawing.
The student can include in their drawing two people using the device to illustrate how people can communicate over distances.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing how the string telephone allows the transmission of sound between the two users.
The student can label the drawing to indicate how humans use this technology to communicate and how life would be different without such devices.
